reviewText:
SYNERGY Entertainment is a NYC based DVD-R manufacturer. Their videos offer no commentary, deleted scenes, subtitles or other bonus features. Dubs are "best available source" and can vary from very good to only fair.

.
Produced by DE VILLE FILMS, an indie outfit with only this single movie to its discredit, SISTERS OF DEATH is some nonsense about former sorority members who hold a reunion at a house in the middle of nowhere. The accidental initiation death of one of their pledges comes back to haunt them, for the women find themselves imprisoned by a loony bent on sanguine revenge. Yawn.

Parenthetical number preceding title is a 1 to 10 IMDb viewer poll rating.

(4.4) Sisters of Death (1977) - Arthur Franz/Claudia Jennings/Cheri Howell/Sherry Boucher/Paul Carr/Joe E. Tata

Low Budget T&A Drive-in Movie.  What more can you ask for?  Claudia Jennings naked.  I bought several DVDs with her in them because I've always thought she was beautiful and sexy.  Just a fun movie with a lot of sexy T&A.
